COMMENT: I copy/pasted all of the data tables from the source book into comments in this file.
Because the book was a PDF, the formatting was DESTROYED in the process and it would have taken
me forever to write something to parse it. But this wonderful little robot did it for me. Not
writing the tool, but rather all the data entry. It UNDERSTOOD the insanely scrambled source
data and parsed it into a nice, clean, readable format. I occasionally made corrections but it
almost always learned from them and corrected future entries. It wasn't perfect, but it saved me
what I believe to be 10+ hours of work. I love you, Copilot.
(And thanks to GitHub for creating Copilot :) )

moderate.name: Haircut or Helmet Ding
moderate.effect: Ignore injury and as a bonus you will not need a haircut for a while

moderate.name: Grazed Cheek
moderate.effect: Succeed at a Toughness test to use any skill that relies on your voice

moderate.name: Grazed Brow
moderate.effect: Succeed at a Toughness test to use any skill that relies on your vision

moderate.name: Ripped Out Earring/Cut Lobe
moderate.effect: Succeed at a Toughness test to use any skill test that relies on your hearing

moderate.name: Beard Trim / Chin Cut
moderate.effect: Flip to fail any skill test that relies on your Fellowship

moderate.name: Helmet / Head Bash
moderate.effect: Reduce your Initiative by 3

serious.name: Grazed Eye
serious.effect: Skill tests that rely on your vision are considered Challenging (-10%). With the exception of Ranged attacks; Medium range is considered Hard (-20%) and Long range is Arduous (-30%)

serious.name: Scalped / or 5 if Helmet
serious.effect: May not use any Reactions

serious.name: Jaw Slashed
serious.effect: Flip to fail any skill test which relies on your voice

serious.name: Helmet Thrown Off / or 6
serious.effect: Only slightly rattled,you must succeed at a Resolve test each Turn or be Stunned. In addition, your helmet is throw 3 yards in a random direction

serious.name: Head Trauma
serious.effect: Cannot use Special Actions in combat

serious.name: Skull Fracture
serious.effect: Flip to fail all skill tests

grievous.name: Severe Concussion
grievous.status: You may only Move as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Ne'er Do Well (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 3% Intelligence)

grievous.name: Mutilated Eye
grievous.status: You cannot see as you're blinded.
grievous.drawback: Black Cataract (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 3% Perception)

grievous.name: Mutilated Ear
grievous.status: You cannot hear as you're in pain.
grievous.drawback: Crop Ear (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 6% Perception)

grievous.name: Mutilated Nose
grievous.status: You cannot smell as you're in pain.
grievous.drawback: Split Face (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 6% Perception)

grievous.name: Cerebral Contusion
grievous.status: Unconscious.
grievous.drawback: Dunderhead (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 9% Intelligence)

grievous.name: Punctured Artery
grievous.status: Incapacitated
grievous.drawback: Frequent Seizure (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 9% Brawn)

moderate.name: Grazed Hand
moderate.effect: Ignore injury and as a bonus you now have an X scar marked on the top of your hand.

moderate.name: Ripped O Fingernail
moderate.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. All melee weapon attacks with this hand are considered Challenging (-10%).

moderate.name: Grazed Forearm
moderate.effect: You cannot use a choke hold.

moderate.name: Minor Cut to Elbow
moderate.effect: All ranged weapon attacks with this hand are considered Challenging (-10%).

moderate.name: Upper Arm Grazed
moderate.effect: Double the penalty to climb or swim for Movement Actions.

moderate.name: Grazed Shoulder
moderate.effect: It will cost you 1 Ap to draw, pick up, swap or give a weapon to an ally

serious.name: Back of Hand Slashed
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You must pass a Toughness test in order to hold anything in this hand. Test before each combat.

serious.name: Thumb Sliced
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You can not use this hand at all, even to hold something.

serious.name: Forearm Pierced
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You can not use a shield with this hand or perform a choke hold.

serious.name: Elbow Slashed
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You can not use any combat actions at all with this hand.

serious.name: Bicep Gashed
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. Flip to fail all Combat, Brawn and Agility tests.

serious.name: Shoulder Sliced
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. Suffer all the ill effect of Bicep Gashed. You can not carry a backpack, rucksack or shoulder bag

grievous.name: Wrist Slashed
grievous.status: You cannot use this hand as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Bleeder (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 3% Combat)

grievous.name: Bicep/Tricep Tendon Cut
grievous.status: You cannot use this arm as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Two-handed Trouble (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 3% Combat)

grievous.name: Forearm Tendon Cut
grievous.status: You cannot use this arm as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Limp Wrist (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 6% Brawn)

grievous.name: Fingers Removed
grievous.status: You cannot use this hand as you are in pain.
grievous.effect: You lose 1D6-1 fingers. For every finger lost, you permanently lose 1% Agility. If you lose all fingers, you gain the listed Drawback.
grievous.drawback: Veteran's Hand (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 6% Agility)

grievous.name: Shoulder Ligaments Cut
grievous.status: You cannot use this arm as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Light Load (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 9% Brawn)

grievous.name: Upper Arm Cleaved
grievous.status: You cannot use this arm as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Veterans Arm (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 9% Brawn)

moderate.name: Grazed Stomach
moderate.effect: Ignore injury and as a bonus you can look cool and lick the blood of your wound like Bruce Leigh, in Enter the Wyrm.

moderate.name: Grazed Chest
moderate.effect: You are Stunned and only have 2 AP per turn.

moderate.name: Stinging Cut to Groin
moderate.effect: You must add 1 additional AP to all Movement Actions.

moderate.name: Grazed Ribs
moderate.effect: It is difficult to catch your breath, you can not use Inspiring Words or Litany of Hatred.

moderate.name: Cut Armpit
moderate.effect: You must add 1 additional AP to any Load or Take Aim Actions.

moderate.name: Grazed Collarbone
moderate.effect: Reduce your encumbrance by 3.

serious.name: Slashed Abdomen
serious.effect: Standard Agility and Willpower Tests are now Hard (-20%).

serious.name: Jarring Cut to Ribs
serious.effect: Flip to fail all Tests that use your voice or breath.

serious.name: Sliced Chest
serious.effect: Flip to fail all Ranged Attack Tests.

serious.name: Slashed Back
serious.effect: Your encumbrance is halved.

serious.name: Slashed Side
serious.effect: You must pass a Resolve Test to do any Action other than Hustle.

serious.name: Punctured Armpit
serious.effect: You can not use this arm.

grievous.name: Lower Side Fractured
grievous.status: Incapacitated.
grievous.drawback: Restless Sleep (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 3% Brawn)

grievous.name: Heavy cut to the Ribs
grievous.status: Incapacitated.
grievous.drawback: Bad Ticker (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 3% Brawn)

grievous.name: Abdomen Sliced
grievous.status: You can do nothing but hold your guts in.
grievous.drawback: Sour Stomach (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 6% Brawn)

grievous.name: Collar Bone Broke
grievous.status: Unconscious.
grievous.drawback: Light Load (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 6% Willpower)

grievous.name: Lung Punctured
grievous.status: Unconscious.
grievous.drawback: Weak Lungs (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 9% Willpower)

grievous.name: Crippling Stab to the Spine
grievous.status: Unconscious.
grievous.drawback: Partial Paralysis (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 9% Agility)

serious.effect: Refer to the movement adjustment table on page 31. You cannot Run or Charge.

serious.effect: Refer to the movement adjustment table on page 31. As number 1, also you must add 1 AP to Get Up, Hustle, Maneuver and Take Cover.

serious.effect: Refer to the movement adjustment table on page 31. You must flip to fail all Reaction Tests.

serious.effect: Refer to the movement adjustment table on page 31. You are Knocked Prone and cannot take any Movement Actions on your own.

serious.effect: Refer to the movement adjustment table on page 31. You cannot use any Reactions.

grievous.status: You cannot use Movement Actions as you are in pain.

grievous.effect: You lose 1D6-1 toes. For every toe lost, you permanently lose 1% Brawn. If you lose all toes, you gain the listed Drawback.

moderate.effect: Ignore injury, you quickly pull back as the blow misses your face by a hair.

moderate.effect: You must flip to fail any skill test that relies on your voice.

moderate.effect: You are Stunned. Also, you must roll a 1d6 chaos die. If you roll a face “6” you fall prone on the ground for 1 minute.

moderate.name: Arm Push
moderate.effect: Ignore injury, the weapon pushes your arm around, spinning you in a circle. The only thing injured is your ego, as you look the fool. Fight on!

moderate.name: Knuckle Rap
moderate.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in your hand. You must flip to fail all one-handed melee and ranged attack actions with this hand.

moderate.name: Forearm Strike
moderate.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in your hand. You can not use Chokehold, Dirty Tricks, Disarm, Splinter Shield and Stunning Blow Perilous Stunts with this arm.

moderate.name: Funny Bone Blast
moderate.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in your hand. You must flip to fail all Ranged Attack Actions with this arm.

moderate.name: Bicep Slap
moderate.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in your hand. You can not climb, swim or use the Drive Skill.

moderate.name: Shoulder Bruise
moderate.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in your hand. It will cost 1 additional Action Point to do anything with that arm.

serious.name: Hand Smash
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You can not hold anything in this hand.

serious.name: Wrist Whack
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You can not use this hand for any skill test falling under Combat, Brawn or Agility.

serious.name: Deep Bruise to Forearm
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You can not use a shield in this hand, also you can not perform the Perilous Stunts; Choke Hold, Dirty Tricks, Disarm, Splinter Shield and Stunning Blow.

serious.name: Elbow Crunch
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. Your lower arm hangs limp at your side, you can not use that hand for anything.

serious.name: Severe Bruise to Upper Arm
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. This arm is useless and you must add 1 Action Point to use any Combat action with your other arm.

serious.name: Should Dislocated
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. This arm hang limp at your side, totally useless. Suffer all the ill effects of Severe Bruise, in addition you can not carry a backpack, rucksack or shoulder bag.

grievous.status: You cannot use this arm as you are in pain.

moderate.effect: You must add 1 Action Point to all movement actions. Also for first round only you are Stunned.

moderate.effect: If your condition is lower than Unhindered on the Peril Condition Track you are Stunned and have 1 less Action Point each turn.

moderate.name: Helmet Knock/Hair Graze
moderate.effect: Ignore injury, minor ricochet offhelmet, an inch or so lower and it would have been your eye.

moderate.name: Ear Graze
moderate.effect: You must pass a Toughness Test in order to use any skill that involves hearing.

moderate.name: Forehead Graze
moderate.effect: You must pass a Toughness Test in order to use any skill that involves sight.

moderate.name: Cheek Graze
moderate.effect: You must pass a Toughness Test in order to use any skill that involves your voice.

serious.name: Impact to Skull
serious.effect: Standard tests are now considered Hard (-20%) for Intelligence based skills tests.

serious.name: Stinging Temple Graze
serious.effect: Skill test that involves your vision, including Combat skills will be Challenging at Short range, Hard at Medium range and Arduous at long range.

serious.name: Earlobe Blasted O
serious.effect: You must flip to fail any skill tests that involves your hearing.

serious.name: Cheek Thru & Thru
serious.effect: You must flip to fail any skill test that involves your voice, including casting spells.

serious.name: Chin Pierced
serious.effect: You must flip to fail Fellowship based skill tests.

serious.name: Shot Lodged in Neck ⦿
serious.effect: You must flip to fail Inspiring Words, Litany of Hatred and Incantation skill tests unless you pay 1 additional AP.
serious.⦿: The shot is still lodged in place. A successful Heal test will remove the shot with no penalty to the victim. A failed Heal test will result in the shot being removed but the Patient will suffer 1d10+1 Physical Peril. A critical failure is the same as failure but the patient will suffer 2d10 +2 physical Peril. If the injury is Grievous, removing the shot is part of the surgery

serious.⦿: The shot is still lodged in place. A successful Heal test will remove the shot with no penalty to the victim. A failed Heal test will result in the shot being removed but the Patient will suffer 1d10+1 Physical Peril. A critical failure is the same as failure but the patient will suffer 2d10 +2 physical Peril. If the injury is Grievous, removing the shot is part of the surgery

serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You must flip to fail all Attack Actions unless you pay 1 additional AP. Also you are Stunned.

serious.name: Upper Arm Thru & Thru
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You must flip to fail all tests that uses this arm unless you pay 1 additional AP.

serious.name: Shoulder Muscle Shredded
serious.effect: You immediately drop whatever you are holding in this hand. You must flip to fail all tests that uses this arm unless you pay 1 additional AP. Also you are immediately Stunned.

grievous.status: You cannot use this arm as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Bleeder (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 3% Brawn.)

grievous.status: You cannot use this hand as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Two-handed Trouble (If you already have this Drawback, you permanently lose 3% Brawn.)

moderate.name: Belt Buckle Shot
moderate.effect: Unfortunately your belt buckle was hit and shatters. Your belt and everything on it falls to the ground, Spend 1 turn gathering all of your gear.

moderate.name: Hip Grazed
moderate.effect: You must pass a Toughness tests or lower your Initiative by 3.

moderate.name: Chest Graze
moderate.effect: You must pass a Resolve test to use Cast Magick, Inspiring Word, Litany of Hatred and Counterspell.

moderate.name: Right Side Graze
moderate.effect: You must pass a Toughness test to use your right arm.

moderate.name: Left Side Graze
moderate.effect: You must pass a Toughness test to use your left arm.

moderate.name: Collar Bone Graze
moderate.effect: You must pass a Toughness test each Turn during combat or be Stunned.

serious.name: Near Groin Impact
serious.effect: You are Stunned.

serious.name: Abdomen Thru & Thru
serious.effect: You can not eat and drink normally. Suffer 2d10 + 2 physical peril each day.

serious.name: Spine Shock
serious.effect: You must roll a d6 chaos die at the end of each minute of heavy action (combat, chase, etc) if you roll a face 6, you are paralyzed for one minute.

serious.name: Ribs Broken
serious.effect: You must flip to fail all tests that involve your voice or breath.

serious.name: Chest Punctured ⦿
serious.effect: You must flip to fail all Combat and Brawn skill tests.
serious.⦿: The shot is still lodged in place. A successful Heal test will remove the shot with no penalty to the victim. A failed Heal test will result in the shot being removed but the Patient will suffer 1d10+1 Physical Peril. A critical failure is the same as failure but the patient will suffer 2d10 +2 physical Peril. If the injury is Grievous, removing the shot is part of the surgery

serious.name: Armpit to Back Pierced
serious.effect: Your Encumbrance limit is halved.

grievous.status: You cannot use Movement Actions as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Pain Killer If you already suffer from this Drawback you lose 3% Agility.

grievous.name: Foot Thru & Thru ⤖
grievous.status: You cannot use Movement Actions as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Veteran's Boot If you already suffer from this Drawback you lose 6% Agility.
grievous.⤖: The missile is still lodged in place. A successful Heal test will remove the missile with no penalty to the victim. A failed Heal test will result in the missile being removed but the patient will suffer 1d10+1 Physical Peril. A critical failure is the same as failure but the patient will suffer 2d10 +2 physical Peril. If the injury is Grievous, removing the missile is part of the surgery.

grievous.name: Calf Mutilated
grievous.status: You cannot use Movement Actions as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Light Load If you already suffer from this Drawback you lose 6% Agility.

grievous.name: Knee Thru & Thru ⤖
grievous.status: You cannot use Movement Actions as you are in pain.
grievous.drawback: Manikin Joint If you already suffer from this Drawback you lose 6% Agility.
grievous.⤖: The missile is still lodged in place. A successful Heal test will remove the missile with no penalty to the victim. A failed Heal test will result in the missile being removed but the patient will suffer 1d10+1 Physical Peril. A critical failure is the same as failure but the patient will suffer 2d10 +2 physical Peril. If the injury is Grievous, removing the missile is part of the surgery.

grievous.name: Upper Leg Tendons Cut
grievous.status: Incapacitated
grievous.drawback: Hobbled Gait If you already suffer from this Drawback you lose 9% Brawn.
